title: Trump says "So what?" when told Pence evacuated for safety during Capitol riot
summary: When informed that Vice President Mike Pence had been rushed to a secure location as violent Trump supporters stormed the Capitol, Trump responded "So what?" according to the Jack Smith report. Alone in the White House dining room watching news coverage, Trump then tweeted at 2:24 PM attacking Pence for not joining his conspiracy, despite knowing rioters had breached the Capitol and Pence was in danger.
